channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: The Designer Who Presented the iPhone Air to the World Has Left Apple, Report Says
item.description: He's at an AI startup now, according to "people familiar with the move."

item.title: The Final ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ Trailer Is as Dazzling as Ever
item.description: In case you needed one more reason to see 'Avatar: Fire and Ash,' Disney's got one last trailer to sell you.

item.title: Why Google’s smarter weather might be the most useful AI in your life
item.description: Google’s new WeatherNext 2 AI system brings smarter, faster, and more nuanced weather forecasting directly to your apps and daily decisions.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 18, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for November 18, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 18, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for November 18, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for November 18, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1612 on November 18 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Exclusive: Grab the Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones (2nd Gen) for the lowest price this Black Friday using our coupon code
item.description: The second-generation Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones are simply stunning for music, noise cancellation and comfort. Our exclusive discount code brings them down to a more accessible price this Black Friday.
